archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Evaluate and close crisis
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Crisis Management Team with all fixed roles have been released from CMT duties. Before the Crisis Management Process can be ended the following tasks must be completed:
Implementation of improvements shall be followed. Those roles nominated from Crisis Management team are responsible of this task as well reporting the status to Crisis Manager.
Root cause analysis and lessons learned with improvement plan shall be collected and documented.
Lessons learned information shall be shared among those participated into the Crisis Management activities.
Crisis Manager nominates roles which are responsible of completing this task.
